nodes.text: A grapefruit was a type of handheld-sized fruit. During the Battle of Christophsis in 22 BBY, Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano used grapefruit-sized explosive charges to destroy a shield generator that had defended the Separatist Droid Army from the Clone Army's ranged weaponry.
Grapefruits were mentioned in the junior novelization of the film Star Wars: The Clone Wars, which was written by Tracey West and published in 2008.
